name: Dyna Blaster Classic
description:
Dyna Blaster Classic - is a classic game with a multi levels to explore.
To pass each level you must strategically think when and how to place bomb to kill all enemies and destroy obstacles. The player have to find on each level the special portal which teleport him to the next level of the game.The portal will be active when you kill all enemies. On the each level you can get the special item which increase your ability. Of ‘course this item is hidden and you have to use bombs to discover where it is. Be careful and put the special attention because you will die when you will collide with enemy or you will be in the range of bomb explosion. Bomb will explode after predefined time and you have to be in that time far away from the place of range of bomb explosion. Some special skills will be lost if you died. Do not worry, you can get it again on the next levels.

Game Functions:
- Campaign mode with 64 levels. Go through 8 different worlds full of devious monsters!
- Campaign online mode on 2 players. You can take your friend to awesome adventure.
- Survival mode. Challenge you against random opponents in the Battle Area.
